name: Animal Crossing GB (Villagerjj)
description:
This is Animal Crossing GB (title may change) this is an attempt to bring the animal crossing experience from the GameCube to the Gameboy.
Current features:
RTC (using software)Different faces (you can use a GameCube face guide)1 town with 25 acrescustom sprites submitted by: redoctorok, PixelMarshal, and ElviesName your character "Peet" with the male gender, and when rover asks how much money you have say "Yeah!" to access Peet the Pirate (done by redoctorok)8 unique fully functional villagerskeyboard by SodoDevWorking Bell Counter (can't get bells at the moment, but trust me it works)
Feature to come:
trade codes (Like on the gamecube)post office (wip)Timed events (like morning aerobics, or Toy Day)able sisters (GBC exclusive)the police stationSending Mail to villagersinventory (WIP)Blanca
Info:
if you want to follow my progress, visit https://trello.com/b/fk4FZtng/animal-crossing-gb
If you want to submit feedback, do it here: https://forms.gle/XWaoCRvfMR3xRhjw6
most pixel art was drawn by Mort Mort
the pixel art I drew:
tom nookfroggy chairtableboxOkie villagerall menus (except the keyboard)dialogue boxtitlescreenpathwayMitzi villagerand moreNooks cranny
